author: _shemnon
content: Has python 3.10 support been dropped for EEST?  (not a problem, just curious why PR#708 broke my env, and 3.10->3.12 fixed it)

author: marioevz
content: It might have been #712? because that one modified the `setup.cfg`, but in that case, what might have fixed your env is just the reinstall (`pip install -e .`), not the python upgrade I think, because we still run the CI for 3.10 and is passing

author: _shemnon
content: Yes, had my terminal backwards.  #708 works #712 breaks.  May have been the re-install to 3.12.
